audio module¶

class audio.Sound¶

Bases : object

This is a class that manages the sounds of the game (in the GUI version).

on_start¶
Type

path to the sound played when a new game starts

on_move¶
Type

path to the sound played when a tile is played

background_sound¶
Type

path to the background music

change_sound_state()¶

Called when the Sound button is pressed. It toggles the background music on and off.

Paramètres

None –

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

onBackground(state='play')¶

Plays background music in a loop if sound is enabled.

Paramètres

None –

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

onMove(state='play')¶

Plays sound on move.

Paramètres

None –

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

onStart(state='play')¶

Plays sound on start.

Paramètres

None –

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None
